Quality:good
Performance:doing well so far

The pic and video quality is quite good. The interface inside is just like normal samsung but what makes it fun is that you can see ur notifications, change spotify songs, open a few apps and track your steps all at the small screen in front (and more). The video quality is good hoewever the front cam is not that great. But no issues on that bcs you'll be using more at the back camera. Im impressed with samsung health features as i use it often for my workout routine. I do notice 0.5 lens is not that clear but still acceptable. Overall good experience and in love with how cute and convenient this phone is.
